item.title: [Practical Guide] How to Extract Main Content From Web Pages Using Machine-Learning
item.description:
Following Jupyter Notebook is a step-by-step tutorial I took when making the Hacker News Digest, hope you find it helpful:

How to extract main content from web pages using Machine-Learning
